enemies

Class JumpyGuy

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameMembers.Drawable
      • gameMembers.EnvironmentMember
        • enemies.BasicEnemy
          • enemies.JumpyGuy

  • public class JumpyGuy
extends BasicEnemy
    This class is a jumping enemy representation.
    It follows the player much faster than any other enemy in the game, but only intermittently.
    Author:
    Hughes

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The number of frames that the character waits in between jumps.

      static int JUMPING_FRAMES
      The number of frames that the character jumps for.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(Point p)
        Updates the location of the character, given the Player's location. This also increments the frame counter of the JumpyGuy, allowing it to jump.
        Specified by:
        update in class BasicEnemy
        Parameters:
        p -

      • draw

        public void draw(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)
        Description copied from class: EnvironmentMember
        This method is inherited from the Drawable class. This implementation takes a Graphics object when called and uses it to draw the object on the screen. The intended use of this method is to be able to draw an entire ArrayList or Drawable[] and draw the entire thing using a simple loop:

        for(Drawable d : drawables)
        d.draw
        Specified by:
        draw in class BasicEnemy
        Parameters:
        g - the Graphics object required to draw
